description: This file defines a Remix route component for a notes list application, handling data loading, creating new notes, and rendering the notes list interface with search and navigation functionality.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Loads notes data, handles user authentication, extracts search parameters, and fetches notes from API.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles creation of a new note via form submission, including authentication check and API call.

methods.name: NotesIndex
methods.description: React component rendering the notes list UI, search form, and navigation links.
